main event: An unidentified object, described as saucer-shaped, was sighted near Laredo, Texas, on May 21, 1952.
interesting points: The object was reported to be reddish in color,The object was observed traveling at extremely high speeds both vertically and horizontally,The military was involved in the observation and investigation of the sighting,The length of the observation is unknown,The investigation report concluded that there was not sufficient information to evaluate the sighting.
witness description: military personnel involved in the observation
